title: Revamped Death Recap sneak preview!
body: Finally, it actually has useful information!

replies.body: I don't understand at all why this is in M&G. These are some really serious improvements to an important topic

Killer
-Your own tilt
-Statik shiv proc from Drake

What are those items in Draven's 3 slot, and Karma's 2 slot? I see this isn't just a teaser for the new Death Recap, but a teaser for new items as well! Hope they'll be useful!
Also looks like a teaser for damage getting reduced too. Look at that, 1344 damage in 19 seconds? I look forward to these changes, and hope they come soon! (obligatory /s)

RIP Avarice Blade and buyable wards. You have been missed.
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
We all wish for better days.
I expected someone burning someone else with sassy comment and the kill assigned to Ignite.
I'll be satisfied the moment I no longer will see myself come up as assist in my own death recap.
i can't handle the truth....It will tilt me even more.

if {{champion:142}}  kills you ..should say Z OMEGALUL E 
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

I still make cringe plays all the time, but these days when I see a behind ADC, pushing a lane, alone, BLIND, PAST RIVER!!!

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
